casebody.data:
Van REYPEN
v.
TEETER. No. 84PA06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 1, 2006. D. Lane Matthews, Charlotte, for Gerald Teeter, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of April 2006 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Van Reypen Associates, Inc.) shall have up to and including the 7th day of June 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 1st day of May 2006."
